description: This source file defines an authentication service for an event planning backend, implementing user login, registration, JWT token issuance, and password hashing/verification.

classes.name: IAuthService
classes.description: Interface defining methods for authentication services including login, registration, and password management.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Implementation of IAuthService, handling JWT token generation, user registration, and password hashing/verification.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Authenticates a user and issues a JWT token if credentials are valid.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a new user after ensuring the email isn't already registered, hashing the password.

methods.name: IssueToken
methods.description: Creates and signs a JWT token for an authenticated user, returning the token string and expiration date.

methods.name: HashPassword
methods.description: Hashes a password with a provided salt using PBKDF2.

methods.name: Verify
methods.description: Verifies a password against a stored hash.
